meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stacy Meyers Gudrun Juffer Sarah McNitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6754.

td.p: Stacy Meyers, a graduate student of education from Fredericksburg, Virginia
Gudrun Juffer, a law clerk originally from Milwaukee, Wisconsin
Sarah McNitt, a study-abroad advisor originally from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,400)

tr.td: CEREAL CHARACTERS
BEETHOVEN
WHAT'S YOUR SIGN, BABY?
NO VOWEL BUT Y
A NOVEL CATEGORY
THROWN OF GAMES

Sarah
')
